channel.title: Run.Bat Stopped Working?
channel.description: Alright, so when I was just coding my server, Outta knowhere my run/bat stopped working. When i open it, it would close REALLY fast. What i had to do was take a screenshot, just so that i could read what it said. It says, 'java' is not recodnized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Can somebody help me fix this?

item.title: Run.Bat Stopped Working?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Your ClassPaths are messed up…

1.goto C:\Program Files\Java , copy right click the file with “jdk1.” in it and copy the text

2.goto your desktop,Right Click Your “My Computer” and select properties

3.goto the advanced tab and click the enviorment varibles button

4.You should see 2 boxes, in the top box find/make a varible called CLASSPATH and for the value put this
“C:\Program Files\Java[FolderYouCopiedTheNameOf]\bin;.” then click ok

5.then make/edit another varible called “PATH” and put this as the value
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;”

6.In The Lower Box Find classpath and edit it and put this
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%”

if you don’t have it then make it then click ok then apply (if you can) then the last ok and your problem should be fixed

Read full topic

@Darkest_Fury wrote:

What are classpaths? I’m stupid… lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 10:21:29 pm[/size][hr]Yeah I figured it all out.

item.description:
@Korkle777 wrote:

K, i got it working, just make sure ur classpaths r set to the right java folder…mine wernt working cuz i deleted my acc on my comp so im using a diff one now
